member.name: P:LuisEntityHelpers.DateTimeHelperSettings.IgnoreThePast
member.summary: If set to True will not return dates in the past and will limit time ranges if they are happening now.

member.name: P:LuisEntityHelpers.DateTimeHelperSettings.StartOfDay
member.summary: Used to set the start of a range when only a day is known

member.name: P:LuisEntityHelpers.DateTimeHelperSettings.EndOfDay
member.summary: Used to set the end of a range when only a day is known

member.name: F:LuisEntityHelpers.DateTimeResolutionType.Date
member.summary: A specific date (ignore the time part) Can also access startTime and endTime so can be treated like a range

member.name: F:LuisEntityHelpers.DateTimeResolutionType.Time
member.summary: A specific time (ignore the date part)

member.name: F:LuisEntityHelpers.DateTimeResolutionType.Range
member.summary: A period with a start datetime and an end datetime

member.name: F:LuisEntityHelpers.DateTimeResolutionType.InPastSoIgnored
member.summary: No value will be accessible as setting to ignore the datetime was set
